mapper.insert: insert into tbl_attach_info (uuid, fileName, uploadPath, image, b_i_no) values (#{uuid}, #{fileName}, #{uploadPath}, #{image}, #{b_i_no,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_attach_info WHERE SUBSTR(uploadPath, LENGTH('E:/upload/') + 1) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
